attributes.action: Maintain UK control over the national nuclear deterrent by retaining the controlling interest in BNFL and by doing so retain control of the Atomic Weapons Establishment  (AWE)- Aldermaston
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The UK Trident capability is based on American technology however the warheads for this system are UK designed, manufactured and decommissioned at AWE.
If the government sells off it's interest the UK will be completely in the hands of the USA in this field.
